### Period `r currentPeriod`: team stats

```{r teamStats, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
for(i in names(allRosters[[names(currentPeriod)]])){
  cat(paste0("\n#### ", i, "\n"))
  print(kable(allRosters[[names(currentPeriod)]][[i]]$battingStats, caption="batters", row.names = FALSE))
  print(kable(allRosters[[names(currentPeriod)]][[i]]$pitchingStats, caption="pitchers", row.names = FALSE))
}
```
